name: Lose(Time)Tho
description:
Lose(Time)Tho is a minuscule, relaxing and interactive image of a window: clean it while you listen to a little loop!

this experiment is only available on Ouya, and it was made in one single night during the Ouya Anniversary Game Jam 2020.

it's a sort of homage to the fireplace games, a genre that i discovered thanks to this (now-no-more)abandoned console!

HOW TO PLAY
move the stick to clean the window, press "A" to quit. if you catch every stain, the game will restart. the game will close itself after ten minutes, so it should be safe (especially for your tv) if you want to relax some more and then you end up sleeping! but remember to close it manually, if possible, since it's a large image with little or no movement inside :)

feel free to tell me if you find problems, bugs, etc.!
